ComicInfo.Summary:
In the near future all metal on earth suddenly turns to worthless piles of rust and dust. With no technology, no guns, no computers, humanity has reverted to a violent feudal system. But now the secrets of the monoliths are starting to be revealed.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Leo Rodrigues | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Nicholas Ely | 2 | Note: The digital edition (9/4/2019) for this issue was released before the print edition.
